message.content:
I need to identify the increase in the amounts of tax accrued but not yet paid from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see all the line items in the operating activities section. The item related to tax accrued but not yet paid would be labeled as "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" since tax payable represents taxes that have been accrued but not yet paid to tax authorities.

From the cash flow statement, I can see:
- "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" with a value of 288001.20

This positive amount indicates an increase in tax payable during the period, meaning more taxes were accrued than were paid.

Therefore, the specific value for the increase in the amounts of tax accrued but not yet paid is 288001.20.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '288001.20'}}
```
